TEXT.TITLE: UNITED TECHNOLOGIES <UTX> GETS NAVY CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: United Technologies Corp has received a 130.7 mln dlr contract to exercise an option for seven SH-60F CV anti-submarine helicopters and associated maintenance trainers, the Navy said. reuter
